newsitem.title: FRANCE: Cie des Signaux to buy Philips data unit.
newsitem.headline: Cie des Signaux to buy Philips data unit.

text.p: France's Compagnie des Signaux said on Thursday that it planned to buy Philips Electronics unit Philips Datacommunication and that the acquisition should be completed in the first quarter of next year.
The French company said in a statement that it had signed a memorandum of understanding and the acquisition fitted into its strategy of external growth. It did not give a price.

Philips Datacommunication, based in Fontenay-aux-Roses in France develops, makes and sells telecoms equipment and had 1995 sales of 254 million guilders, or around 750 million francs, of which about one third was generated in France, it said.
